name: Ingrid Zukerman
content: Ingrid Zukerman - Monash University Ingrid Zukerman public CV View Scopus Profile Ingrid Zukerman Professor Professor, Department of Data Science & AI https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2237-5017 EmailIngrid.Zukermanmonashedu 1986 …2025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyIngrid works in the Faculty of Information Technology at Monash University as a Professor.Research interests Natural language processing Discourse planning Spoken language understanding User modeling Plan recognition Monash teaching commitmentProfessor Ingrid Zukerman has experience as the Chief Examiner for the following units in the Faculty of IT: FIT3080 Intelligent systems FIT4009 Advanced topics in intelligent systems FIT5047 Intelligent systems FIT9005 Computer architecture and networks Ingrid has experience as the Lecturer for the following units in the Faculty of IT: FIT3036 Computer science project FIT3080 Intelligent systems FIT4009 Advanced topics in intelligent systems FIT5047 Intelligent systems FIT9005 Computer architecture and networks Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all.
